@@ -73,8 +68,10 @@ def save_model(model, filepath, overwrite=True, include_optimizer=True):
   Raises:

body: @aylusltd Sorry for the delay in reviewing. There is duplication below. Can you refactor the following few lines into a module-level function and call the function in both places? Also: the pylint disable line should be applied to only the `import h5py` line, so that the linter item is not disabled throughout the .py file.
